content: row 11-13 work 3 row in st st use mattress stitch to sew seams and whip stitch to assemble toy pieces row 14 k6 mb ssk k1 k2tog mb k6 17 sts 2 row 15-17 work 3 row in st st ears make 2 row 18 k2 ssk x 3 k1 k2tog x 3 k2 co 4 sts with pink yarn 11 sts row 1 purl bind off row 2 s1 k1 m1 k2 5 sts cut yarn leaving a long end for seaming sew row 3 s1 p4 up the back seam leaving the bound-off edge row 4 s1 m1 k3 m1 k1 7 sts open stuff the body if the toy will be played row 5 s1 p6 with use an extra length of mc yarn to sew row 6 ssk k3 k2tog 5 sts down the edges of the bobbles secure yarn bind off leave yarn ends for attaching the ends ears to the head/hat head hood start at back co 6 sts with mc start at the front co 22 sts with cc yarn row 1 purl row 1 knit row 2 k1 m1 k1 x 5 11 sts row 2 ssk k18 k2tog 20 sts row 3 purl row 3 k2 p16 k2 row 4 k2 m1 k1 x 3 k2 m1 k1 x 3 k1 row 4 ssk k16 k2tog 18 sts 17 sts row 5 k2 p14 k2 row 5-9 work 5 row in st st row 6 knit row 10 k2 ssk k1 k2tog k3 ssk k1 k2tog row 7 k2 p14 k2 k2 13 sts row 8 k8 m1 k2 m1 k8 20 sts row 11 purl row 9 k2 p16 k2 row 12 k3 k2tog k3 ssk k3 11 sts row 10 k9 m1 k2 m1 k9 22 sts row 13 purl fold hood in half and graft together back from row 14 k2 k2tog k3 ssk k2 9 sts neck to hood-peak or work one more ws row 15 purl row then bind off and sew the back seam of row 16 k2tog x 2 k1 ssk x 2 5 sts the hood secure yarn ends cut yarn thread end through remaining sts for ties thread a length of yarn around the and pull tight to gather attach safety eyes lower edge with ends extending at the front above the 2nd and 3rd decreases on row 10 if you like add a pom-pom tassel or bell to beginning at gathered stitches sew the seam the hood point towards the back of the head adding stuffing as you sew gather together cast-on stitches then secure yarn ends 3 beret co 18 sts with cc yarn and a dpn divide sts abbreviations evenly between 3 needles x n = repeat sequence in brackets n times round 1 join in the round k1 p1 to end to end means to repeat until the end of the round 2 k1 p1 to end row beg = beginning round 3 k2 m1 x 9
